colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @042B (CES BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG 'BREL BA'I PHYAG CHEN GYI GSUNG BSHAD ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA DRAN PA'I GDUNG SEL @043A *, ,ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, LUG LO'I DPYID RJE BLA MA DE NYID NAS BKA' CHOS BAR MA CHAD DU GNANG DUS BDE LAM DANG PHYAG CHEN GYI KHRID GANG RGYAS GNANG BAR PHRAN BKA' 'BANG THA SHAL, ^RATNA DHVA DZAS GZHUNG BSHAD KYI KHOG YID LA BZHAG NAS ZUR THON PA'I RIGS ZIN THONG BKOD, SLAR GZHUNG BSHAD YID 'JAGS BGYIS PA DANG MNYAM DU RGYAS PAR BKROL RTZIS BYAS KYANG, CUNG ZAD GA-YENG BA'I DBANG DU SONG BA'I MUR RJE BLA MA NYID GLO BUR CHOS DBYINGS SU MNAL BA'I TSUL BSTAN PAR LUS SROG 'BRAL BA LTA BU'I SEMS 'TSER GYIS DRAN PA STOR, MYA NGAN GYIS NON PAS BLO YUL NAS SHOR, SHING SPREL DBYAR GNAS KYI SKABS SNGAR GYI ZIN THO LA BRTAGS PAS PHAL CHER BRJED KYANG SKU 'DA' KHA'I ZHAL CHEMS LTA BUR GO NAS DRAN TSO DANG GA RIM BKOD, GZHUNG BSHAD JI LTAR GNANG BA LEGS PAR MA DRAN PAS BTANG SNYOMS SU BZHAG ,BRJED SONG BA 'GA' ZHIG KYANG DPYAD PA'I GZHIR ZIN THO RANG BABS SU BRIS, GSUNG GI BABS MA BCOS PAR BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA SRAS DANG BCAS PAS BSTAN 'GROR SMAN PA'I THUGS BZHED MTHA' DAG LHUN GYIS GRUB CING KHYAD PAR THUB BSTAN SNYING PO RGYAL DBANG BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I RING LUGS KYI BSHAD SGRUB PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,PAR 'DI KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I, ,THUGS RJE LA BRTEN BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GLING GI ,LHO RGYUD MDO SNGAGS CHOS SGRA SGROGS PA'I TSAL, ,DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DU LEGS PAR GRUB,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
